line_1: As the Offspring of Nettle. Hypocritical Folly
line_2: And none are so righteous and seemingly Holly,

line_1: Loathing this world and all its folly,
line_2: In lays most musical and melancholy, —

line_1: Haste, FANCY, from these scenes of folly
Thy humorous Vein, thy pleasing Folly
Or Whimsy with its Parent Folly;
Lest you had been outdone in folly —
line_2: And roar'd, and been damnation jolly,

line_1: Years seem to've shown her all her folly, —
line_2: To've thrown a shade of melancholy
